猦字的基本解释

猦
fēng
〔猦??（
m?）〕古代传说中的一种像猿的动物，见人则叩头，轻轻一打便昏死，遇风一吹就复活。

猦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fēng］
［《廣韻》方戎切，平東，非。］
见“猦”、“猦貍”。

猦字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　猦； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页714第15
【廣韻】方戎切【集韻】方馮切，?音風。【玉篇】猦?，獸名。有尾，小打卽死，因風更生。【廣韻】猦母，狀如猿，逢人則叩頭，小打便死，得風還活。出異物志。【正字通】猦貍，狀如猿而小，目赤，尾短如無尾，身無毛，自鼻至尾一道有靑毛，廣寸許，見人若慙，屈頸叩頭，擊之卽死，以口向風，須臾復活。本作風。【酉陽雜俎】一名狤?。

猦字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
猦字的起名意思

暂无。

Xuan
Basic explanation of words
Xuan
fēng
〔猦?? (
m?)] An ape-like animal in ancient legends, it kowtows when it sees people, faints with a light beating, and resurrects when the wind blows.
Xuan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fēng］
["Guangyun" Fang Rongqie, Pingdong, Fei. ]
See "xuan" and "xuan".
Xuan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　猦; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 714 15
[Guangyun] Fang Rongqie [Jiyun] Fang Fengqie, sound and wind. 【Jade articles】Yu?, the name of the beast. There is a tail, and Xiao Daqi died, but was resurrected by the wind. [Guang Yun] Mother Yu, who looks like an ape, kowtows when she meets people, kills after a small beating, and lives by the wind. Out of foreign matter. 【Zhengzitong】The raccoon is like an ape but small, with red eyes, short tail like no tail, hairless body, and a wide line of hair from nose to tail. It is wide and wide. If you see people, you will be slumped. If you die, you will be resurrected shortly after you speak to the wind. This style. [Youyang Miscellaneous] A man?
Xuan
